movies.title: Dune: Part Two
movies.plot: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen while on a warpath of revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family. Facing a choice between the love of his life and the fate of the universe, he endeavors to prevent a terrible future.

poster.caption: Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Stellan Skarsgård, Rebecca Ferguson, Dave Bautista, Austin Butler, Timothée Chalamet, Zendaya, Florence Pugh, and Souheila Yacoub in Dune: Part Two (2024)

movies.title: Deadpool & Wolverine
movies.plot: Deadpool is offered a place in the Marvel Cinematic Universe by the Time Variance Authority, but instead recruits a variant of Wolverine to save his universe from extinction.

poster.caption: Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman in Deadpool & Wolverine (2024)

movies.title: The Substance
movies.plot: A fading celebrity takes a black-market drug: a cell-replicating substance that helps her create a younger, better version of herself.

poster.caption: The Substance (2024)

movies.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
movies.plot: After being snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, while the tyrants Dementus and Immortan Joe fight for power and control, the young Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.

poster.caption: Charlize Theron, Tom Burke, Lachy Hulme, Nathan Jones, Xanthia Marinelli, Ranjeet Manjrekar, Chris Hemsworth, Cyrus Ning, Shakriya Tarinyawat, Goran D. Kleut, Josh Helman, Hiroshi Kasuga, Anya Taylor-Joy, Robert McFarlane, and Cody Riley in Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga (2024)

movies.title: Gladiator II
movies.plot: After his home is conquered by the tyrannical emperors who now lead Rome, Lucius is forced to enter the Colosseum and must look to his past to find strength to return the glory of Rome to its people.

poster.caption: Denzel Washington, Connie Nielsen, Pedro Pascal, and Paul Mescal in Gladiator II (2024)

movies.title: Alien: Romulus
movies.plot: While scavenging the deep ends of a derelict space station, a group of young space colonists come face to face with the most terrifying life form in the universe.

poster.caption: Aileen Wu in Alien: Romulus (2024)

movies.title: Civil War
movies.plot: In a dystopian future, four journalists travel across the United States during a nation-wide conflict. While trying to survive, they aim to reach the White House to interview the president before he is overthrown.

poster.caption: Civil War (2024)

movies.title: Anora
movies.plot: A young stripper from Brooklyn meets and impulsively marries the son of a Russian oligarch. Once the news reaches Russia, her fairy tale is threatened as his parents set out for New York to get the marriage annulled.

poster.caption: Mark Eydelshteyn and Mikey Madison in Anora (2024)

movies.title: Nosferatu
movies.plot: A gothic tale of obsession between a haunted young woman and the terrifying vampire infatuated with her, causing untold horror in its wake.

movies.title: The Fall Guy

poster.caption: Ryan Gosling and Emily Blunt in The Fall Guy (2024)

movies.title: Inside Out 2
movies.plot: A sequel that features Riley entering puberty and experiencing brand new, more complex emotions as a result. As Riley tries to adapt to her teenage years, her old emotions try to adapt to the possibility of being replaced.

movies.title: Wicked

poster.caption: Ariana Grande and Cynthia Erivo in Wicked (2024)

movies.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
movies.originalTitle: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes

movies.title: Blink Twice

movies.title: Moana 2

movies.plot: After a group of criminals kidnap the ballerina daughter of a powerful underworld figure, they retreat to an isolated mansion, unaware that they're locked inside with no normal little girl.

movies.title: A Complete Unknown

movies.title: Madame Web
movies.plot: Forced to confront her past, Cassandra Webb, a Manhattan paramedic that may have clairvoyant abilities, forms a relationship with three young women destined for powerful futures, if they can survive their threatening present.

movies.title: Emilia Pérez
movies.plot: It follows three remarkable women in Mexico, each pursuing their own happiness. Cartel leader Emilia enlists unappreciated lawyer Rita to help fake her death so that she can finally live authentically as her true self.

poster.caption: Zoe Saldaña, Karla Sofía Gascón, and Selena Gomez in Emilia Pérez (2024)

movies.title: Wolfs

movies.title: Monkey Man
movies.plot: An anonymous young man unleashes a campaign of vengeance against the corrupt leaders who murdered his mother and continue to systematically victimize the poor and powerless.

movies.title: Argylle
